abstract: Right to Rise, the “super PAC” supporting Jeb Bush’s candidacy, has created its first negative ad of the cycle, attacking Donald J. Trump, Senator Marco Rubio and Senator Ted Cruz.

headline.main: Pro-Jeb Bush Ad Assails Donald Trump and Two Other Rivals

snippet: Right to Rise, the “super PAC” supporting Jeb Bush’s candidacy, has created its first negative ad of the cycle, attacking Donald J. Trump, Senator Marco Rubio and Senator Ted Cruz.

keywords.value: Right to Rise Policy Solutions Inc
